乃.definition: to be; thus; so; therefore; then; only; thereupon

乃堆拉.definition: Nathu La (Himalayan pass on Silk Road between Tibet and Indian Sikkim)

乃堆拉山口.definition: Nathu La (Himalayan pass on the Silk Road between Tibet and the northeastern Indian state of Sikkim)

乃是.definition: equivalent to either 是[shi4] or 就是[jiu4 shi4]

乃至.definition: and even; to go so far as to
